SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller

Class BaseServerConnection

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.controller.BaseServerConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
PlayerObservableTracker, Closeable, AutoCloseable
public abstract class BaseServerConnection extends Object implements PlayerObservableTracker, Closeable
Object which represents and keeps track of the connection of a specific player.

This is used to keep track of observers and any network-related objects and can be used to close everything once the player disconnects.

    • registerObserver

      public <T> Consumer<T> registerObserver(Provider<T> toObserve, PlayerObservableTracker.ThrowingConsumer<T> observer)
      Description copied from interface: PlayerObservableTracker
      Register an observable for the given player and track it in order to remove it on disconnection

      In addition, the observer will be wrapped to catch any potential disconnection exceptions and act based on those to close the connection and signal the player as disconnected

      Specified by:
      registerObserver in interface PlayerObservableTracker
      Type Parameters:
      T - type of the observable value
      Parameters:
      toObserve - value the current player is interested in observing
      observer - player's observable
      Returns:
      the actual observer registered to the value, which is an implementation that wraps the given toObserve parameter

    • unregisterObservers

      protected void unregisterObservers()
